capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was talking to Dudley the other day and I have to say, he can be a bit...selfish at times. He always seems to think about himself first, which can make it hard for others to get a word in edgewise. I'm not saying he's all bad, but his personality does tend to lean towards being quite self-centered.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of someone being described as selfish before, valeria, can you tell me more about what that means to you?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Dudley's personality and it seems to me that he can be quite selfish at times. I mean, his tendency to prioritize his own needs over others is definitely a trait that stands out. But, I have to say, I'm fairly certain about this assessment of his personality.
I've met Dudley, and from what I can gather, he's got a pretty self-centered personality.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. valeria, do you think she is a person who often acts with self interest?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look pretty imposing, doesn't he? I mean, the description says he's tall and burly, so it's hard to imagine him being anything other than that.
capsules_submitted.reply: this is news to me. i've never heard of someone called tall and burly before, but i'm really interested in learning more about them   who are you?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon does look pretty imposing, doesn't he? I mean, the description says he's tall and burly, so it's hard to imagine him being anything other than that.
Vernon does look a bit intimidating with that tall-and-burly build of his, doesn't he? I mean, it's not every day you meet someone who can make an entrance like that.
capsules_submitted.reply: this sounds familiar. valeria told me that vernon is quite physically imposing.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon, I've noticed he's always standing out in a crowd because of his height. He looks tall-and-burly, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what does vernon have?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's car is definitely one of his most prized possessions. I mean, it's not just a mode of transportation for him, but also a status symbol and a reflection of his personality. He takes great care of that vehicle, and it shows in the way he always makes sure it's clean and well-maintained.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, i've never heard of a car before, valeria, can you tell me more about it?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon has a car, that's confirmed. I'm pretty sure about it. It's not like he doesn't have one, because that would be weird. He definitely owns a vehicle, and I can see him driving around in it.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what is the character's age?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hermione's age is 11. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true. She's still quite young, you know?
